meaningMnemonic: The <radical>leader</radical> all in <radical>white</radical> is the <kanji>chief</kanji>. All the other leaders are wearing some other color, but that's how you tell the chief apart from the other leaders.
readingMnemonic: The reading is the same as 白, which is included in this kanji. The other reading is お, and it's like the honorific 御, in a way. You'd want to be polite to someone who is the chief ______, right? That's why it could be お, too.
